title: Spread of Islam to West Africa via trade routes

content.question: Which of the following was most responsible for the initial spread of Islam to West Africa?

choices.label: Soldiers who fought on behalf of the Abbasid caliphate
Merchants on the trans-Saharan trade routes
Muslims fleeing persecution on the Iberian peninsula

content.answer: Merchants on the trans-Saharan trade routes

topic.text: 1.2: Developments in Dar al-Islam from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
